title: Lovely townhome 2 bdrm/2bthrm 1400 sq ft
map_address: South Cobb Drive near Old Concord Road
posting_body: Very spacious 2bdrm, 2btrm, 3 level culdesac End unit townhome is located in quiet community and quaint subdivision is available August 5th for rent.
TH has newer painting, tile, and light and plumbing fixtures.
New thermostat is programmable allowing for energy efficiency.
Townhome is located in outstanding Cobb County school district and near Smyrna Village, Emory Adventist Hospital, and Cumberland Mall.
It is less than 5 mi.
from 285/75/E-W conn.
and on CCT transportation line.
Charming townhome has brick front and yard.
It has cathedral ceilings and gas starting wood burning fireplace in the living room.
It is great for roommates or in-law suite with bedrooms and their private bathrooms located on Separate Floors.
Master bathroom has separate garden tub and shower.
Main level bathroom has tub/shower combination.
White appliances include refrigerator, gas stove, dishwasher, and microwave.
Kitchen also has a garbage disposal.
Washer and Dryer in unit.
Unfinished basement can be used for playroom or extra storage.
There is a large newly rebuilt deck great for entertaining and a 2 car parking pad.
$1800 per month.
Deposit required.
Pets a possibility.
Showings available.
Please call or text for more information and to schedule.
Thx...
